cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on January 21, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5683, Department of Homeland Security Border Support Services Contracts Review Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 186 (Friday, October 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. CAMMACK:
H.R. 5683.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H5833]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 167.

title: Department of Homeland Security Border Support Services Contracts Review Act
